titles.title: Agency PAYGO Act of 2013

A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to include in any proposed rule that limits greenhouse gas emissions and imposes increased costs on other Federal agencies an offset from funds available to the Administrator for all projected increased costs that the proposed rule would impose on other Federal agencies.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
9/23/2013--Introduced. Agency PAYGO Act of 2013 - Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to include in a proposed rule that limits greenhouse gas emissions and imposes increased costs on other agencies an offset from funds available to the Administrator for all projected increased costs that the proposed rule would impose on other agencies.
Prohibits the Administrator from finalizing such a proposed rule unless such an offset is provided.
